type.description: Connect to an HTTP REST API.

headers.description: The headers to include for all REST API requests.

endpoints.description: The endpoints for the REST API operations. Each item can be a string (the URL) or an object with a `method` and `url` properties.

description.description: A description of the REST API operation. This can help the agent better choose the right operation.

url.description: The endpoint of where the REST API operation will be performed.

method.description: The HTTP method for the REST API operation. Defaults to `GET`.

search.description:
The search parameters that the agent will convert into `?key=value&key2=value2`.

- For the key, use the name of the key to be passed.
- For the value, use a descriptive value that describes the purpose of the param so that the agent can understand it.
